alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 6:25PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A cluster of gusty showers will impact portions of southern Gulf and west central Franklin Counties through 715 PM EST/615 PM CST/... At 624 PM EST/524 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of gusty showers 15 miles south of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Nine Mile, Highland View, Eleven Mile, St Joseph State Park, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Tilton, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Milltown, Simmons Bayou, Beacon Hill and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
